marklogic.body:
I am the last person to defend Carmichael Dave, but I listened to his show today and I didn't find him offering excuses, and he sure as heck didn't fight back when something was negatively said about the Maloofs unlike Napear who defended the Maloofs before he even knew what was going on.Â
Carmichael DaveÂ said he wasn't going to bash the Maloofs, but he darn sure said that these guys blew away any of the recent PR Gains.Â
Yes, he said that in his heart he believes that Joe and Gavin Maloof are good guys who want to remain - which I personally think is a stretch, but at least they are in Sacramento taking the Heat while the person who I believe is causing the problems is laying low away from said Heat.Â My guess is that this whole story has George Maloof written all over it...
